member.summary: Generates a MD5 hash and returns it as string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if provided input contains some of pre-listed true-values and returns true or false

member.summary: Tries to parse the given input to short. Returns 0 if false.

member.summary: Tries to parse the given input to integer. Returns 0 if false.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to parse the given input to long. Returns 0 if false.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to parse the given input to DateTime format. Returns DateTime.MinValue if false.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Turns the first letter of the input to capita, if the input itself is not empty or not null.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches for some startString and returns substring between its position and endString's position.

member.summary: Converts the cyrillic letters to latin letters.

member.summary: Converts the latin letters to cyrillic letters.

member.summary: Validates the input and turns it to a valid username.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the first charsCount-quantity characters of the string input.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Splits the file name by '.' and returns the lowercase string following the '.', which represents the file name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the file's content type, depending to the file extension.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
